The word you wish to search

The message contains more of 140 characters. You has the next options for send it

Prepare saved drafts for quick tweeting (when you need it?)

If you enable this option saves the user\'s timeline in your database. Can be used if you don\'t want to follow an user but you want to write tweets and have notifications of mentions and direct messages, thereby improving battery performance. The TimeLine will be downloaded directly. Want to save your TimeLine on the phone?
Loading data for the first time. This process may take a little longer than normal
An update in background is detected to be taking more than expected and can be hung ¿Do you wish to stop it?
Choose priority and color for the desired messages to be shown in ADW Launcher application icon. In case there are no messages, it will forward next, being the first the one with more priority
Total amount of new messages from notified searches.
Updating background. Please wait a moment
You can only have one only user in the Lite version. Upgrade to Pro version and you will have everything you need
Widget not available in Lite version
You need a user logged into the application to use the widget
Saving resulting tweets to the database
No tweets saved for now. Remember you can save tweets from "Read later"

There are no links in this tweet

You can not have more than 5 notified searchs
You can have only one notified search in Lite version. Upgrade to Pro version and you can have up to 5
No results were found with the language:
. You can possibly find results if you delete this filter. Want to search again without specifying the language?

You will delete the old copy. Are you sure?
